commandDescription: This command is used to generate datamodel report from project
objectspathDescription: list of Paths to object location, if not provided all the project paths from sfdx-project.json
outputdirDescription: location to create the datamodel report
filterDescription: apply filter to reduce the result by types
formatDescription: format of the output file to create
includechangelogDescription: Generate changelog for data model. This will fetch the entire git history for generating changelog, be advised on time consumption
activechangelogpathDescription: Path to existing changeLog.json file if available
loglevelDescription: logging level for this command invocation
